```{r}
lr<- lm(Sales~ .,data = new_train)
summary(lr)
pred<-predict.lm(lr, newdata = new_train)
```

```{r}
pred
```


```{r}

res <- stack(data.frame(Observed = new_train$Sales, Predicted = fitted(lr)))
res <- cbind(res, x = rep(new_train$Date, 2))
head(res)

require("lattice")

xyplot(values ~ x, data = res, group = ind, auto.key = TRUE)



```

calc.relimp(lr,type=c("lmg","last","first","pratt"),
